Summary: Witnessed UFO over my home in Springfield, Mo
divs: Sighting DetailsI was inside watching tv when I had this almost like a voice in my head tell me to grab my camera and go outside so instinctively I ran outside with my camcorder and that's when I saw a black orb like UFO hovering and changing directions South West of where I live.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around August 12th 2013
